duties_responsibilities.duty: Refill all mini-bars according to standards and report any encountered problems.
Check for missing items, rotate products, and ensure labels are facing out for easy reading.
Take physical inventories of mini-bars as requested.
Record and report any mini-bar problems encountered.
Refill all bars as listed on computer printout and replenish clean mini-bar glasses as necessary.
Wipe down mini-bars to ensure cleanliness and pick up VIP list to check all mini-bars in designated VIP rooms.
